attributes.action: local authorities to do something about anti social behaviour in penzance
attributes.background: Anti social behaviour and groups of drug takers are causing a problem with the town of penzance Cornwall local councils and authorities are not doing anything about this something needs to be done as this is having a effect on tourism and local businesses

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 
http://www.freepetition.co.uk/cornwall/
